parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: Display state option as defined in swDisplayStateOpts_e

parameters.name: AssemblyDisplayStateNames
parameters.description: Array of assembly display state names; valid only if Option is set to swDisplayStateOpts_e.swSpecifyDisplayState

title: IComponent2.SetVisibilityInAsmDisplayStates
description: Sets the visibility of this component in the specified assembly display state(s).
signature:
System.Boolean SetVisibilityInAsmDisplayStates( 
   System.Int32
HideComponent
,
   System.Int32
Option
,
   System.Object
AssemblyDisplayStateNames
)

parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: Display state option as defined in swDisplayStateOpts_e

parameters.name: AssemblyDisplayStateNames
parameters.description: Array of assembly display state names; valid only if Option is set to swDisplayStateOpts_e.swSpecifyDisplayState

returns: True if visibility successfully set, false if not
